name: MK Poslovni savjeti
goal:
In order to help meet clients' challenges and opportunities successfully in a global economy we offer a full arsenal of capabilities and experience and a range of professional public affairs and strategic communications services to our multinational clients.

Within the key areas of Public Affairs, Government Relations Consulting, Lobbying Services, and Strategic Communication, we are skilled at delivering powerful solutions.

We leverage our huge experience in the public and private sectors to help clients negotiate complex political, government, and business issues and achieve the most favorable results. We believe there is no substitute for experience.

With our network of affiliates and consultants we are able to deliver integrated lobbying and communications campaigns at local, national, regional and European level.

Our team includes former high-ranking government officials that are using their vast knowledge and experience to deliver results for our clients.

Our core capabilities focus on the development and implementation of legislative and regulatory strategies aimed at decision makers in the government.

Whether it is legislative affairs, executive branch relations, regulatory solutions, or all of the above, we develop custom-made strategies to meet our clients' needs.

We can help clients develop and implement their own strategies that will support their long-term success.

We are here to help clients survive—and thrive—in a world of laws and regulations.
